data.name: Red Solstice 2: Survivors - Thanatos Armor Skin
data.detailed_description:
Watch out for the Thanatos creature in Red Solstice 2: Survivors! It's been named after the Greek God of Death for good reason.

Get your hands on this unique in-game armor skin and radiate fear across planet Mars.

This item is an in-game cosmetic only and is only available with a purchase of Red Solstice 2: Survivors (sold separately) on Steam.
